sentences.en: Corporate executives exude pride as they whip ultrathin computers with exotic finishes out of their satchels.
sentences.cn: 企业高层主管从背包里掏出来外型炫酷的超薄计算机,难掩得意.

sentences.en: He should exude ruggedness and power , living up to his nickname, the " Diehard. "
sentences.cn: 他有时也蛮横而且力气大,所以为自己赢得了 “ 顽固分子 ” 的雅号.

sentences.en: Men in bars exude confidence, but they also exude beerwell!
sentences.cn: 酒吧里的男人会流露出自信, 但同时也会充斥着酒气.

sentences.en: Only leaves behind that share to exude the yellow pledge.
sentences.cn: 只畱丅内份泛黄旳承诺.

sentences.en: People who exude confidence really seem to have it made.
sentences.cn: 那些充分显露自信的人好像天生就是成功的胚子.

sentences.en: Put a lot of stock in dogs that exude energy, are alert and show fearlessness.
sentences.cn: 表现出力量 、 警觉并且毫不畏惧的狗一定做了大量的准备.

sentences.en: RESULTS: No blood was remarkably found to exude from abdominal cavity drainage tube.
sentences.cn: 结果腹腔引流管均无明显渗出.
她流露出了极大的自信.

sentences.en: Some successful men exude self - confidence .
sentences.cn: 有些成功的人流露出 自信.

sentences.en: Substance said to exude from the body of a medium.
sentences.cn: 假想由灵媒身体发出来的物质.

sentences.en: Such people exude an indistinct anger and hatred.
sentences.cn: 这样的人浑身散发着间接的愤怒和憎恶.

sentences.en: The gilded, scallop - embellished plates at Serena's table exude Fall warmth, with a glamorous touch.
sentences.cn: 面前镀金镶边的盘子使得本来冷冰冰的瓷器拥有了秋天的温暖.

sentences.en: The plant exudes a sticky liquid.
sentences.cn: 这种植物会分泌一种黏液。

sentences.en: The sun made him exude sweat.
To exude from a vessel into surrounding tissue.
sentences.cn: 外渗从脉管流入周围的组织.

sentences.en: To exude or give off ( matter ) in drops or small quantities.
sentences.cn: 使挤出;使滴下以点滴或少量的渗出或排出 ( 物质 )

words.tran_cn: 渗出，渗出物；分泌，分泌物

trans.tran_cn: (使)流出, (使)渗出, 发散开来
trans.tran_en: to flow out slowly and steadily, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 渗出，缓慢流出，发出，发散
使渗出，使流出，充分显示，显露，发出，散发
